Credits:

Authors

  • Woomi Ban (banwoomi@unc.edu):
    • Sub-developer who tested and refined the module structure

Contributors

  • Drs. Chris Rorden and Sebastiano Ferraris:
    • The pioneers related this project who had been inspired the developer through their great tools including dcm2niix and bruker2nifti, as well as their comments to improve this project.
  • Drs. Mikael Naveau and Gabriel A. Devenyi:
    • The distributor of bruker2nifti_qa, the set of data to help benchmark testing of Bruker converter.
